mapper.select: /* intrMainInqy1011 : 로그인 사용자 조회 */ SELECT EMP.EMP_IDX , EMP.DEPT_CD , DEPT.DEPT_NM , EMP.GRADE_CD , GRADE.GRADE_NM , EMP.EMP_NM , EMP.EMP_GENDER , EMP.EMP_PHONE , EMP.EMP_ADDR , EMP.EMP_ADDR_INFO , EMP.EMP_EMAIL , EMP.EMP_ID , EMP.EMP_PWD , EMP.EMP_HIRE_DATE , EMP.EMP_RESI_DATE , CASE WHEN AE.AUTH_CD IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS AUTH_YN FROM INTR_EMP EMP LEFT OUTER JOIN INTR_DEPT DEPT ON DEPT.DEPT_CD = EMP.DEPT_CD AND DEPT.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN INTR_GRADE GRADE ON GRADE.GRADE_CD = EMP.GRADE_CD AND GRADE.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN INTR_AUTH_EMP AE ON AE.EMP_IDX = EMP.EMP_IDX AND AE.AUTH_CD = 'AUTH_0001' WHERE UPPER(EMP_ID) = UPPER(#{empId, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
